Warrior's Grave: You have successfully completed the memorial service by singing the Warrior's Song correctly. Suddenly, you hear an answering echo of the song all around you. Almost delicately, a small cloud of dust rises from the grave. The cloud coalesces in mid-air, then moves toward you and gently settles in your pocket. [Quest Q00126_TheNameOfEvilPart2 warriorgrave_q126_26.htm|"Are these your ashes?"]
